reviewText: Great show but was originally worried that it was produce or made in Canada. All the packaging was in English/French.

One of the most riveting and under-appreciated series I've watched.  Jeff Daniels is fantastic as the Newsroom anchor and the cast is perfectly balanced.  I originally watched this series through Netflix and loved it so much I bought it as a gift.  I can't say enough praise for the writers, cast and support staff- this is the best series I've seen in years!
